recipe.title: Raspberry Smash Cocktail
ingredients: 1 half bottle (375 ml) demi-sec Champagne or other semidry sparkling wine, chilled
instructions: Gently stir together raspberries, Chambord, and sugar in a small bowl, then macerate, covered and chilled, at least 1 hour and up to 2.
Spoon 2 tablespoons raspberries with some juice into each of 2 Champagne flutes or other glasses and slowly top off with Champagne.
